name: core_arch::x86::bmi1::_blsr_u32

num::<impl u32>::wrapping_sub.doc:
Wrapping (modular) subtraction. Computes `self - rhs`,
 wrapping around at the boundary of the type.

doc:
Resets the lowest set bit of `x`.

 If `x` is sets CF.
